title: Western Novel and Short Stories
additional-notes: A note in the 1970 CCE Periodicals volume says to 'consult copyright office' for full issue renewal information.  The first cataloged issue renewal, mentioned in the July-December 1977 CCE Periodicals volume, is for the July 1942 issue, and was filed in 1970.

This magazine sometimes reprinted stories from other publications.  Some of those stories may still be under copyright from their earlier publication.  We have not systematically reviewed the copyrights of those stories.  (The first contribution renewal shown here is the first one where 'Western Novel(s) and Short Stories' is specifically mentioned in the renewal record.)
